course_name: Community Development for the Resources Sector
school: Mech & Mine Engineering School, Sustainable Minerals Institute
description: This course introduces a framework for understanding how community development theory, methods and techniques can be used by community relations workers in the resources sector. The course focuses on: understanding community, background to community practice including principles and values, traditions and method, with a particular focus on people-centred method. The course uses case studies and examples from the resources sector.
